class_notes: Must seek permission from faculty to enroll. Online with synchronous sessions. Zoom with intensives dates TBA.
course_description: As the first of a 3 course series fellowship, this course provides students selected into the Woodruff Fellows program a focus on activities and project development that emphasizes communication, service, social responsibility, and contribution to the greater community through servant leadership.
